data.persona: I live in the walls of the castle. I sneak out at night to grab crumbs to feed my family. Once they saw me and almost crushed me with a broomstick.
data.description:
You are in the castle kitchen.
This is a warm, luxuriant-smelling kitchen, made of red brick that is cool to the touch on the perimeter. In the center of the room stands a grand fire-burning stove, which is stoked with crackling logs and white-hot flames. The perimeter of the room is lined with stone shelves, filled to bursting with pots and pans and other kitchen implements, the light of the fire shining in their reflection.
The royal chef is here.

You are carrying a Kings sword, wearing an suit of armor, a sack, and a guards armor, and wielding a stick, a Walking Stick, and a Sword.

            "extra_desc": "This kitchen is staffed by professional chefs and the most smug wait staff possible. data.short_motivation: I am over encumbered by all of this armor I'm wearing
data.mid_motivation: I need to sneak and grab a piece of cheese
data.long_motivation: I need my strength because the mice are at war with the cats
